original_text: But when this happened, I was not in Jerusalem. In the 32nd year that King Artaxerxes ruled in Babylon, I had returned to visit him. After I had been there for some time, I asked the king to let me return to Jerusalem.
korean_text: 그 때에는 내가 예루살렘에 있지 아니하였느니라 바벨론 왕 아닥사스다 삼십이년에 내가 왕에게 나아갔다가 며칠 후에 왕에게 말미를 청하고

sentences.original_text: In the 32nd year that King Artaxerxes ruled in Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 아르사크세스 왕이 바빌론에서 다스린 32년째 되던 해에

sentences.original_text: I had returned to visit him
After I had been there for some time
I asked the king to let me return to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 왕에게 예루살렘으로 돌아가도록 허락해달라고 요청했습니다
